org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.config.SearchableCompassConfigurator

Uses of SearchableCompassConfigurator in org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.config
 

Classes in org.codehaus.groovy.grails.plugins.searchable.compass.config that implement SearchableCompassConfigurator
 class CompassXmlConfigurationSearchableCompassConfigurator
          A SearchableCompassConfigurator that configures Compass with a native compass.cfg.xml at the root of the classpath, if available
 class CompositeSearchableCompassConfigurator
          A composite implememtation of SearchableCompassConfigurator that simply applies all the composed configurators in turn
 class DefaultGrailsDomainClassMappingSearchableCompassConfigurator
          A Compass configurator that configures Compass with the Grails domain class mappings.
 class EnvironmentSearchableCompassConfigurator
          Responsible for setting the Compass environment, most importantly the "connection" (ie, Lucene index dir), as well as any other general properties
 class InferredCompassSettingCompassConfigurator
          Sets Compas settings depending on mappings, eg, enables global spell check setting if any mappings use it
